trans-unit.source: A special kind of property that can be defined or attached to a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Olyan különleges definiálva, vagy csatolt tulajdonság egy <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: There are three kinds of dependency properties: instance properties, meta properties, and attached properties.
trans-unit.target: Három típusú függőségi tulajdonságok: példány tulajdonságait, a metatulajdonságok és a csatolt tulajdonságok.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Dependency properties support three use cases.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]A függőségi tulajdonságok három használati eseteket támogatja.

trans-unit.source: First, if an instance property of an activity is implemented by using a dependency property, that property can be assigned an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> instead of an actual value.
trans-unit.target: Először egy példány tulajdonság tevékenység függőség tulajdonság segítségével történik, ha ez a tulajdonság lehet hozzárendelni egy <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind>egy tényleges érték helyett.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind>

trans-unit.source: Second, activity properties that are metadata (that is, the value cannot change at run time) should be implemented by using dependency properties, specifying the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions> option.
trans-unit.target: Második, tevékenység tulajdonságokhoz metaadatok (Ez azt jelenti, hogy az érték futás közben nem módosítható) függőségi tulajdonságok, meg kell valósítani a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions>beállítás.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions>

trans-unit.source: Third, dependency properties support attached properties, which are properties that are applied to dependency objects dynamically.
trans-unit.target: Függőségi tulajdonságok harmadik, amelyek tulajdonságokat függőségi objektumhoz dinamikusan csatolt tulajdonságok támogatja.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref> that represents user-defined data for this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"> </xref> a felhasználó által definiált adat, amely jelöli <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.

Gets the registered <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> based on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name*> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType*>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a regisztrált <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> alapján a <> </> *> és <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
The required value of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType*>.

The registered <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> based on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name*> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType*>.
Creates an <xref:System.Collections.IList> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that belong to a specific <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Létrehoz egy <xref:System.Collections.IList>típusú <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> tartozik, amely egy adott <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type>.
<xref:System.Collections.IList> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that belong to a specific <xref:System.Type>.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Az adott példány kivonatkódját adja vissza.

trans-unit.source: The hash code computed here is the `bitwise AND` of the hash codes generated by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType%2A> attributes of this <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.
trans-unit.target: A kivonatkód számított Itt a `bitwise AND` által generált kivonatoló kódot a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name%2A>, és <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType%2A>a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty> attribútumok</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: A hash code for this instance.

Gets the property that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> is associated to a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> by registration.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a tulajdonság, amely jelzi, hogy ez <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> társítva egy <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> eszközregisztrációs szerint.

trans-unit.source: The value returned indicates whether this <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty> has been registered by using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A visszaadott érték azt jelzi, hogy ez <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>használatával van regisztrálva a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if attached to a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha csatlakozik egy <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref>; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the property that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> is an event <xref:System.Delegate>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a tulajdonság, amely jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> <xref:System.Delegate>.</xref:System.Delegate> esemény

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> is an event <xref:System.Delegate>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> esemény <xref:System.Delegate>; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Delegate>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data required to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Kitölti egy <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> szerializálni a célobjektum szükséges adatokkal.

The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the data.
Overrides the <xref:System.Object> method to return the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name*> property value.
This represents the name of the property or event that is being mirrored by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.
